title: La Femme Infidele = the Unfaithful Wife
creator_contributor_role: Les Films La Boetie, production company
description: A respectable middle-class husband, complacently happy in his marriage, discovers that is wife has been having an affair with another man. He confronts the lover and kills him in an attempt to save his marriage. This film is the first of a trilogy on adultery (all starring Chabrol's then wife, Stephane Audran) including 'La Rupture/The Breakup' (1970) and 'Juste avant la Nuit/Just before Nightfall' (1971). Also available on VHS.  Credits: Producer, Andre Genoves ; director, Claude Chabrol ; writer, Claude Chabrol ; photography, Jean Rabier ; music, Pierre Jansen ; art direction, Guy Littaye ; editor, Jacques Gaillard. Cast: Michel Bouquet, Stephane Audran, Maurice Ronet, Michel Duchaussoy, Donatella Turi.
